item.title: AC Charger Main App SW Architecture
item.description: Software Architecture Configuration The configuration of the application is provided by the app::Config class. It contains the global, shared configuration of the application. It uses an external TOML file to read the settings that must be adapted by the end-user. If the file doesn’t exist, it is created with default values. An instance of this class is used by the main method. Logger Using the Boost Library Boost.Log is used as the logging tool.
